0.text: Bug 114886  [Acceptance]Font setting changes in highlight Editor everytime you reopen it..

1.text: Description: Font setting(such as Cursive) changes in highlight Editor everytime you open it.

4.text: Add a highlight rule for it, set Font to Cursive and click Ok 3.

5.text: Double click to reopen the highlight Editor, font changed to Monospace,  click OK 4.

6.text: Double click to reopen the highlight Editor, font changed to Serif, click OK 5.

7.text: Repeat step4, font changed back to Cursive.

8.text: Expected result: While edit the highligh rule, it displays the customer's setting.

9.text: Actual result: The customer's font setting changed.
